doc:
Yaphet Kotto https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yaphet_Kotto 0 Yaphet Frederick Kotto (born November 15, 1939) is an American actor known for numerous film roles, as well as starring in the NBC television series Homicide: Life on the Street (1993–99) as Lieutenant Al Giardello. His films include the science-fiction/horror film Alien (1979), and the Arnold Schwarzenegger science-fiction/action film The Running Man (1987). He portrayed the main villain Dr. Kananga/Mr. Big in the James Bond movie Live and Let Die (1973). He appeared opposite Robert De Niro in the comedy thriller Midnight Run (1988) as FBI agent Alonzo Mosely. Yaphet_Frederick_Kotto ( born November_15_,_1939 ) is an_American_actor known for numerous_film_roles , as_well_as starring in the_NBC_television_series_Homicide : Life on the_Street ( 1993 – 99 ) as Lieutenant_Al_Giardello . His_films include the_science-fiction/horror_film_Alien_(_1979_) , and the_Arnold_Schwarzenegger_science-fiction/action_film The_Running_Man_(_1987_) . He portrayed the_main_villain_Dr._Kananga/Mr . Big in the_James_Bond_movie Live and Let_Die (_1973_) . He appeared opposite_Robert_De_Niro in the_comedy_thriller_Midnight_Run_(_1988_) as FBI_agent_Alonzo_Mosely .
